ai.question: A company requires a high-end computer that can store a significant amount of files and process multiple applications quickly and simultaneously. Which two components are the most critical for the computer performance? (Choose two.)
Which peripheral is a storage device that connects to the USB interface and allows files to be saved and moved between computers?
Which component provides backup power to a computer system for a short period of time?
Which term describes static electricity that can be transferred from your body to electronic components in the computer?
What are two examples of input-only peripheral devices? (Choose two.)

A school administrator needs to set up a classroom with devices that allow students to learn business applications such as word processing, spreadsheets and email. The students will also need to do research on the Internet. What devices meet the requirements and provide the most cost-effective solution?
A user opens an application and sends a message to a friend in another country. What type of application has been used?

form-item.ai: used for virtual reality simulationnormally secured in a roompowerful graphic capabilitiesusually has redundant components such as hard drivesruns high-end applications like engineering programsprovides services to multiple clients WorkstationServer Drag the feature on the left to the category on the right.123456no titleno description given1352461Workstation-holds local app, found in cubicle, and runs CAD; Server-services to mult. clients; redundant hard drives, and secured in a room

ai.question: What measurement is commonly associated with graphics resolution?
